cab.content: Secret and Urgent,The Cabinet *ill have observed that theViceroy' a telegrams betray a growing uneasiness as to thesituation in India. I share this feeling. The danger -is increased by the unfavourable development of thePersian situation and may easily become acute,The Cabinet have now had my papers on IndianReforms before them for more than a month. The positionis growing daily more difficult and a declaration of theintentions of Government is urgently required.Once again I press upon the Cabinet thenecessity for a very early discussion and decision.A. C.
